Bookmark: The label of the bookmark toolbar button. Also, a bookmark form header.
Insert: The button in the bookmark insert form.
Bookmark name: The label of the input in the bookmark insert and update form.
The description of bookmark input in the bookmark insert form.
The error message. Displayed when the bookmark name is empty.
Bookmark name cannot contain space chara: The error message. Displayed when provided name includes spaces.
The error message. Displayed when provided name already exists.
bookmark widget: The label for the bookmark widget.
